data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Bengkulu, Indonesia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bengkulu, Indonesia

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Bengkulu to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Bengkulu, Indonesia know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 58,659 believers in Bengkulu against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Sindang Kelingi people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, please defend the 58,659 believers in Bengkulu against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Bengkulu.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bengkulu, Indonesia has a population of 1,828,300.

We estimate Bengkulu has 58,659 people who might know Jesus, 147,370 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,622,270 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 31 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Bengkulu, Indonesia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
